Publication Title: Modelling Radiation Cancer Treatment with a Death-Rate Term in Ordinary and Fractional Differential Equations
Publication Keywords: Differential equations, Cancer Radiotherapy, Mathematical Oncology, Fractional Derivatives, Modelling Simulation
Publication Authors: Nicole Wilson, Corina S Drapaca, Heiko Enderling, Jimmy J Caudell, Kathleen P Wilkie
Publication Abstract: Fractional calculus has recently been applied to the mathematical modelling of tumour growth, but its use introduces complexities that may not be warranted. Mathematical modelling with differential equations is a standard approach to study and predict treatment outcomes for population-level and patient-specific responses.
